backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores hardcoded pun lists, templates, safety checks, and assembles puns based on random indices.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor types with a no-op migration function.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI component handling pun generation, display, and recent pun list management.
frontend/src/components/PunPanel.tsx: Component showing the latest pun with copy support and listing recent puns.
frontend/src/components/RecentPunsList.t: Scrollable card listing recent generated puns.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages the backend actor with identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeneratePun.ts: Mutation hook calling backend generatePun using large random indices and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, state, and login flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes with OKLCH colors and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature states, requirements, and pending feature requests for the NEARâ€‘pun dapp.
